mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Lists.FAQ
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows visitors to browse useful information as a list of questions and answers (FAQ). Supports assigning each item a type and target audience.
